pr_title: Fix null pointer when creating ConnectorSession for LocalExchange

timeline.message: Fix null pointer when creating ConnectorSession for LocalExchange

timeline.bodyText: why the original code has null pointer issue? Maybe explain it a bit in commit message?
timeline.author: wenleix
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -173,7 +173,7 @@ private static PartitionFunction createPartitionFunction(
         ConnectorNodePartitioningProvider partitioningProvider = partitioningProviderManager.getPartitioningProvider(partitioning.getConnectorId().get());
         ConnectorBucketNodeMap connectorBucketNodeMap = partitioningProvider.getBucketNodeMap(
                 partitioning.getTransactionHandle().orElse(null),
-                session.toConnectorSession(),
+                session.toConnectorSession(partitioning.getConnectorId().get()),

replies.author: kewang1024
